      • InitWindow

        public void InitWindow(int width,
                       int height,
                       java.lang.String title)
        Initialize window and OpenGL context. NOTE: data parameter could be used to pass any kind of required data to the initialization
        Parameters:
        width - Window width in pixels
        height - Window height in pixels
        title - Window title - passing null will use a default title

      • CloseWindow

        public void CloseWindow()
        Close window and unload OpenGL context

      • WindowShouldClose

        public boolean WindowShouldClose()
        Check if KEY_ESCAPE pressed or close icon pressed
        Returns:
        true if window is ready to close. NOTE: Must be inverted for use in a while loop
